short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kickstart the development of your Bubble™ app with SudsyLabs ACE services. Buildshare is our client asset delivery portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buildshare is the official delivery mechanism for custom-designed UI elements created by SudsyLabs for our ACE services clients. It provides access to responsive design assets - i.e. builds - directly from the Bubble editor with just a few clicks.

⚠️ Be sure to refresh Bubble™ editor pages after installing this extension.
